m_szDocTitle: Mercedes-Benz GLC Hydrogen To Lead Brand's Electric Car Charge
m_szDocSumamry: Mercedes-Benz GLC Hydrogen To Lead Brand's Electric Car Charge posted 4 days ago Mercedes-Benz GLC Hydrogen To Lead Brand's Electric Car Charge Mercedes-Benz GLC Hydrogen to launch in 2017 with parts shared with its siblings to minimise cost. Mercedes-Benz GLC Hydrogen Range & Refuelling A Mercedes-Benz GLC powered by hydrogen and incorporating transferable parts to minimise cost looks set to launch by 2017. Details are sketchy, but this large, sports utility class, vehicle is expected to have a range of 373 miles. That is comparative to many traditionally fuelled cars and more than most elect
